oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Taʻlīq laṭīf ʻalá al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript, 1640 or 1641
Mīzān fī ʻilm al-ʻarūḍ

Sharḥ al-Khazrajīyah

oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Buṣrawī, Muḥammad ibn Ghars al-Dīn Khalīl , -1484
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophon (f. 14v), copy completed in the hand of ʻAbd Allâh al-Kūrānī.
Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black and red.
Cream laid paper. 20.8 x 15 cm. (16.5 x 10 cm.)
Pasteboards covered with marbled paper, with flap. Red leather over spine and fore-edge flap.

With this is bound: al-Khazrajīyah / li-al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh Ḍiyāʼ al-Dīn al-Khazrajī. 1640 (ff. 15r-18v) al-Risālah al-ūlá min rasāʼil al-Tājūrī fī ʻilm al-mīqāt wa-al-falak. 1635 (ff. 19r-31r) ; al-Risālah al-thānīyah min rasāʼil al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Tājūrī (ff. 32r-39r) ; al-Majmūʻ fī ʻilm al-farāʼiḍ / al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-Rabbānī al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Kalāʼī. 1641 (ff. 39v-69r).
MS Arab 236. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
